meanings: subordinate, (offensive) underling, (폭력 집단 등의) henchman, (집합적) one's men

vlive.korean: 무릎에 부하가 좀 덜 걸리게 해야 되지 않을까요? Shouldn't you do it so that there's less of a load on your knees? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 190718 🐰
vlive.english: Shouldn't you do it so that there's less of a load on your knees?

vlive.korean: 타노스 부하들 2명. - 시끄러! Thanos subordinates... - Be quiet! 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - 비트콤 #65 (2018 BTOB TIME -THIS IS US- 콘서트 마지막 날 비하인드)
박정재 팀장님이 부하 직원이신가요? Producer Park Jeong-jae is your subordinate? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처2 ep36_시즌2 중간 점검! 첫 입금은 과연?
vlive.english: Producer Park Jeong-jae is your subordinate?

vlive.korean: 찬희 & 휘영의 왕의 남자(부하)를 보고 영감을 얻었다~ and said that he was inspired by Cha Ni and Hwi Young's King and The Clown. 듣기 View video SF9 : [LEAGUE OF SF(셒)GENDS] SF9 EPISODE #2 - ROUND 2
vlive.english: and said that he was inspired by Cha Ni and Hwi Young's King and The Clown.

vlive.korean: 꼭 부하 중에 이런 사람들 있단 말야. 이간질 시키는. Of the subordinates, there's always a person like this, who tries to get in between. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST W] L.O.Λ.E RECORD B-Side EP.15 왕이 된 JR, 그가 선택한 미션은?
vlive.english: Of the subordinates, there's always a person like this, who tries to get in between.

examples.korean: The colonel paraded his men before the Queen. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대령이 여왕 앞에서 부하들의 열병식을 거행했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
